row.process:
:SET &runid# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() :SET &CLIENT#=FORMAT("&CLIENTNR#","0000")
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd &PATH_UTILITY# :SET &FILEBKUP#=&PATH_BACKUP_REP#\&CLIENT#\Backup_AUTO_&CLIENT#_&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#_&$PHYS_TIME_HHMM#.txt if not exist "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#" ( mkdir "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#" ) if not exist "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#\&CLIENT#" ( mkdir "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#\&CLIENT#" ) set rc=0 :PRINT " Fichier généré &FILEBKUP# pour client &CLIENT#"
echo ************************************* echo Exécution du backup Manuel : echo ucybdbun -V -LE -BTRANSPORTALL -C&CLIENT# -D -X&FILEBKUP# echo ************************************* echo. ucybdbun -V -LE -BTRANSPORTALL -C&CLIENT# -D -X&FILEBKUP# set rc=%errorlevel%
@set retcode=%rc% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" cd &PATH_UTILITY# :SET &FILEBKUP#="&PATH_BACKUP_REP#/&CLIENT#/Backup_AUTO_&CLIENT#_&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#_&$PHYS_TIME_HHMM#.txt" [[ -d "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#" ]] || mkdir "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#" [[ -d "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#/&CLIENT#" ]] || mkdir "&PATH_BACKUP_REP#/&CLIENT#"
:PRINT " Fichier généré &FILEBKUP# pour client &CLIENT#"
echo "*************************************" echo "Exécution du backup Manuel :" echo "./ucybdbun -V -LE -BTRANSPORTALL -C&CLIENT# -D -X&FILEBKUP#" echo "*************************************" echo "" ./ucybdbun -V -LE -BTRANSPORTALL -C&CLIENT# -D -X&FILEBKUP# rc=$? exit $rc :OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.pre_process: :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1="&CLIENTNR#" :INC JOBI.CLIENT_WITHOUT_BACKUP, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.UNIX_SHELL, NOFOUND=IGNORE !:INC JOBI.ALIAS, NOFOUND=IGNORE
